TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class AbstractQueuedSynchronizer : Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractOwnableSynchronizer, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AbstractQueuedSynchronizer extends Java.Util.Concurrent.Locks.AbstractOwnableSynchronizer implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ISerializable, class System.IDisposable
type AbstractQueuedSynchronizer = class inherit AbstractOwnableSynchronizer interface ISerializable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides a framework for implementing blocking locks and related synchronizers (semaphores, events, etc) that rely on first-in-first-out (FIFO) wait queues.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool CompareAndSetState (int expect, int update);
.method familyhidebysig instance bool CompareAndSetState(int32 expect, int32 update) cil managed

Docs.param: the expected value
the new value
Docs.summary: Atomically sets synchronization state to the given updated value if the current state value equals the expected value.
Docs.returns: true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

Docs.summary: Returns a collection containing threads that may be waiting to acquire in exclusive mode.

Docs.summary: Returns the first (longest-waiting) thread in the queue, or null if no threads are currently queued.

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads have ever contended to acquire this synchronizer; that is, if an acquire method has ever blocked.
Docs.value: true if there has ever been contention

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads have been waiting to acquire longer than the current thread.
Docs.value: true if there is a queued thread preceding the current thread, and false if the current thread is at the head of the queue or the queue is empty

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Queries whether any threads are waiting to acquire.
Docs.value: true if there may be other threads waiting to acquire

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryAcquire(int32 arg) cil managed
abstract member TryAcquire : int -> bool override this.TryAcquire : int -> bool

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is always the one passed to an acquire method, or is the value saved on entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode.
Docs.returns: true if successful. Upon success, this object has been acquired.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if acquiring would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if exclusive mode is not supported

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryAcquireNanos (int arg, long nanosTimeout);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryAcquireNanos(int32 arg, int64 nanosTimeout) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to #tryAcquire but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
the maximum number of nanoseconds to wait
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in exclusive mode, aborting if interrupted, and failing if the given timeout elapses.
Docs.returns: true if acquired; false if timed out

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the current thread is interrupted

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 TryAcquireShared(int32 arg) cil managed
abstract member TryAcquireShared : int -> int override this.TryAcquireShared : int -> int

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is always the one passed to an acquire method, or is the value saved on entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in shared mode.
Docs.returns: a negative value on failure; zero if acquisition in shared mode succeeded but no subsequent shared-mode acquire can succeed; and a positive value if acquisition in shared mode succeeded and subsequent shared-mode acquires might also succeed, in which case a subsequent waiting thread must check availability. (Support for three different return values enables this method to be used in contexts where acquires only sometimes act exclusively.) Upon success, this object has been acquired.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if acquiring would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if shared mode is not supported

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryAcquireSharedNanos (int arg, long nanosTimeout);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryAcquireSharedNanos(int32 arg, int64 nanosTimeout) cil managed

Docs.param: the acquire argument. This value is conveyed to #tryAcquireShared but is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
the maximum number of nanoseconds to wait
Docs.summary: Attempts to acquire in shared mode, aborting if interrupted, and failing if the given timeout elapses.
Docs.returns: true if acquired; false if timed out

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the current thread is interrupted

abstract member TryRelease : int -> bool override this.TryRelease : int -> bool

Docs.param: the release argument. This value is always the one passed to a release method, or the current state value upon entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to set the state to reflect a release in exclusive mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if releasing would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if exclusive mode is not supported

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryReleaseShared(int32 arg) cil managed
abstract member TryReleaseShared : int -> bool override this.TryReleaseShared : int -> bool

Docs.param: the release argument. This value is always the one passed to a release method, or the current state value upon entry to a condition wait. The value is otherwise uninterpreted and can represent anything you like.
Docs.summary: Attempts to set the state to reflect a release in shared mode.
Docs.returns: true if this release of shared mode may permit a waiting acquire (shared or exclusive) to succeed; and false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if releasing would place this synchronizer in an illegal state. This exception must be thrown in a consistent fashion for synchronization to work correctly.
if shared mode is not supported
